God bless you all! - DESTINY

commentable_entity.description:
Johnny Depp as you all know is one of the most iconic, versatile, inspiring, creative, and soulful actors we are blessed with in our life. He truly is a God given work of art and his passion spills out into our hearts through every movie, show, interview, and experience we have or have seen him in. Sadly this society has built up the idea that only women are hurt and taken advantage of, beaten, and used, controlled, and manipulated. This, however, could not be further from the truth. Evil comes in all forms and is not gender specific or race specific. Men have hearts as all children of God do! We are all born with the same chances in life of experiencing good and bad times. 

Johnny has been unfortunate in his last relationship and had to endure the pain of loving someone who continually chose to cause him pain. Being abused by his ex, AMBER HEARD, has led to a disaster in his life being drug through the mud with so many false accusations and horrific rumors. A woman who apparently had a set intent on creating an elaborate story to damage and destroy Johnny for her own personal gain and pleasure. We will never understand the psychotic behavior of that woman but we can stand up and support MEN like Johnny Depp! Never to let him stand alone through this pain. 

Amber Heard has caused damage to his career losing work with Warner Bros & Disney. All whom turned their back on one actor who made them truly amazingly famous and made some of their BEST content ever! (Yes I have my opinions too lol) 

..after this defamation trial proves Johnny to be the abused victim of his horrible ex wife, and the case is won in his favor….

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION DEMANDING ALL PARTIES WARNER BROS and DISNEY, MAKE A PUBLICLY ANNOUNCED FORMAL APOLOGY TO MR. JOHNNY DEPP FOR PREMATURELY JUDGING THESE ACCUSATIONS AND THROWING HIM AWAY LIKE HE MEANT NOTHING. ALSO TO MAKE AMENDS AND OFFER SOME SORT OF ASSISTANCE TO RESTORE HIS CAREER BACK TO HIS PRIME WHERE HE STOOD TALL! 

This is only what is right, and may not be much to some but it is important the right thing be done. Do not let them sit by and play it down like it was nothing big. This affected many people and Johnny and his family personally. 

God bless you all! - DESTINY

commentable_entity.description:
Johnny Depp as you all know is one of the most iconic, versatile, inspiring, creative, and soulful actors we are blessed with in our life. He truly is a God given work of art and his passion spills out into our hearts through every movie, show, interview, and experience we have or have seen him in. Sadly this society has built up the idea that only women are hurt and taken advantage of, beaten, and used, controlled, and manipulated. This, however, could not be further from the truth. Evil comes in all forms and is not gender specific or race specific. Men have hearts as all children of God do! We are all born with the same chances in life of experiencing good and bad times. 

Johnny has been unfortunate in his last relationship and had to endure the pain of loving someone who continually chose to cause him pain. Being abused by his ex, AMBER HEARD, has led to a disaster in his life being drug through the mud with so many false accusations and horrific rumors. A woman who apparently had a set intent on creating an elaborate story to damage and destroy Johnny for her own personal gain and pleasure. We will never understand the psychotic behavior of that woman but we can stand up and support MEN like Johnny Depp! Never to let him stand alone through this pain. 

Amber Heard has caused damage to his career losing work with Warner Bros & Disney. All whom turned their back on one actor who made them truly amazingly famous and made some of their BEST content ever! (Yes I have my opinions too lol) 

..after this defamation trial proves Johnny to be the abused victim of his horrible ex wife, and the case is won in his favor….

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION DEMANDING ALL PARTIES WARNER BROS and DISNEY, MAKE A PUBLICLY ANNOUNCED FORMAL APOLOGY TO MR. JOHNNY DEPP FOR PREMATURELY JUDGING THESE ACCUSATIONS AND THROWING HIM AWAY LIKE HE MEANT NOTHING. ALSO TO MAKE AMENDS AND OFFER SOME SORT OF ASSISTANCE TO RESTORE HIS CAREER BACK TO HIS PRIME WHERE HE STOOD TALL! 

This is only what is right, and may not be much to some but it is important the right thing be done. Do not let them sit by and play it down like it was nothing big. This affected many people and Johnny and his family personally. 

God bless you all! - DESTINY
